item.title: DotNet's DNVM For Persistence On Developer Machines
item.description: One of the best resources for persistence mechanisms is Hexacorn’s blog. http://www.hexacorn.com/blog/category/autostart-persistence/ If you haven’t checked out his “Beyond good ol’ Run key” (linked above) 32 post series, you really should. But today I wanted to talk about one that I didn’t see up there: DNVM (https://github.com/aspnet/dnvm) is the DotNet Version Manager and it’s a part of ASP.NET 5, which I believe has been inside of Visual Studio since the 2013 version.
